snippet.title: Songbird | Announcement Trailer | Meta Quest 2 + Meta Quest 3
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now: https://www.meta.com/experiences/songbird/7191090440901288/

Find your voice with Songbird, the first-of-its-kind karaoke game developed for the Meta Quest! Created by the musical hearts behind the iconic Guitar Hero series, use your voice to bring the vibrant world of Nestopia. Engage with the world filled with “catchables,” rhythmic multipliers, dancing and fun companions who accompany your musical journey to bring some harmony to the world.
    
Songbird Features:
   
EXPLORE NESTOPIA: Immerse yourself in stunning environments, from cozy bedrooms to breathtaking mountain vistas, enhancing your karaoke experience with hand-tracking "catchables," companions, and interactive elements.

33 MASTER TRACKS: Enjoy 33 licensed songs from artists like Billie Eilish and Selena Gomez, with new monthly song packs starting early 2025.

EASY SETUP: Simply wear your Meta Quest headset and start singing—no extra equipment or connection required!

PLAY YOUR WAY: Choose Quick Play for casual fun or Performance mode for a challenge, with three difficulty levels.

INTERACTIVE GAMEPLAY: Experience real-time scoring and rhythmic multipliers; catch bonuses to boost your score while improving your vocal skills.

REVOLUTIONARY NOTE TRACKING: Focus on your performance with a unique note tracking interface that fades away, providing real-time feedback as you sing.

About the team:

Songbird was designed and created by the rhythm game veterans at Always Blue Games in collaboration with the genius minds at Muteki Games Collective. This original karaoke game has stunning visuals, a vast song library, and easy-to-jump-into gameplay. It’s the ultimate choice for music lovers and VR enthusiasts alike. Find your voice, unleash your inner star and join the karaoke revolution with Songbird—where every performance brings the magic of music to life!

Website: https://www.playsongbird.com/
